    public static class GBATileMap.Creator
extends java.lang.Object
    Creator class for creating Tilemaps.

      • setPixel

        public GBATileMap.Creator setPixel(int tileNum,
                                   int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int pixel)
        Set the x/y of the specified tile to a pixel value.
        Parameters:
        tileNum - The tile to use.
        x - The X to modify.
        y - The Y to modify.
        pixel - The pixel to set to.
        Returns:
        This instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - tileNum, x, or y are not in bounds, or the pixel is not valid for the provided bitDepth.

      • setTile

        public GBATileMap.Creator setTile(int tileNum,
                                  GBATile tile)
        Set a tile slot to a specified tile.
        Parameters:
        tileNum - The tile slot to set.
        tile - The tile to replace with.
        Returns:
        This instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - tileNum is not in bounds
        java.lang.NullPointerException - tile is null.

        Throws:
